channel.title: 2014-10-15 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2014-10-15 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 15 Oct 2014 00:00
item.description:
The very concept of diving to depths without any apparatus, Japanese Ama tribe, Spear-Fishing  - Learning about these for the first time today!  Mind boggling!

Deep: Freediving and What the Ocean Tells Us about Ourselves
item.content:encoded:
